argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringnegcl.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ringnegcl.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 |  | ringnegcl.3 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 4 |  | ringsub.4 | |- D = ( /g ` G ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_rngogrpo | |- ( R e. RingOps -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_grpodivval | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( A G ( N ` B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( A G ( N ` B ) ) ) |
